Class Food

  • java.lang.Object
    • Food

  • public class Food
extends Object
    This class creates a food particle that is added to the ArrayList in the FoodSouece class to create the food. There are 3 types of food particles presented in this class, each one of them has a different intensity and effect on the ants.
    Version:
    05/03/2014 15:35:37
    Author:
    CRHanna

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Food()
      a second constructor was created in order to be used in the menu for accessing the methods of a single food particle
      Food(PVector location) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayBiscuit()
      this method gives the food particle the color of biscuit
      void displayFoodUnit(float x, float y, int wSize, int hSize)
      this method display the food unit without any specified type just as a plain square with stroke but with no fill specified to it the fill will be determined by the foodType
      void displaySugar()
      this method gives the food particle the color of sugar
      void displayToxic()
      this method gives the food particle a toxic color
      void foodUnit(float x, float y, int wSize, int hSize, boolean selected, int foodType)
      this method draws the food particle as a rectangle Controls the intensity of the alpha channel of each food type and colors it according to the selection of the icon which is equivelent to to the number of food type given to the argument
      void setFoodColor(boolean selected, int foodType)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Food

        public Food(PVector location)
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the single food particle it will be used by the FoodSource class to position the food particle in the ArrayList in the shape of the grid

      • Food

        public Food()
        a second constructor was created in order to be used in the menu for accessing the methods of a single food particle

    • Method Detail

      • foodUnit

        public void foodUnit(float x,
            float y,
            int wSize,
            int hSize,
            boolean selected,
            int foodType)
        this method draws the food particle as a rectangle Controls the intensity of the alpha channel of each food type and colors it according to the selection of the icon which is equivelent to to the number of food type given to the argument
        Parameters:
        x - the x location of the food particle "
        y - the y location of the food particle
        wSize - the width
        hSize - the height
        selected - whether it was selected or unselected
        foodType - specifies which type of food the particle is 1 is for biscuit 2 is for sugar 3 is for toxic

      • setFoodColor

        public void setFoodColor(boolean selected,
                int foodType)
        Parameters:
        selected - is to determine whether the food is selected or not (in the menu).
        foodType - is to assign a certin number that corresponds to a particular foodType.

      • displayFoodUnit

        public void displayFoodUnit(float x,
                   float y,
                   int wSize,
                   int hSize)
        this method display the food unit without any specified type just as a plain square with stroke but with no fill specified to it the fill will be determined by the foodType
